title: Lawyer pleads guilty to lying to U.S. investigators in Russia probe
text:
Lawyer pleads guilty to lying to U.S. investigators in Russia probe Tuesday, February 20, 2018 - 00:32 
A lawyer and son-in-law of one of Russia’s richest men pleaded guilty on Tuesday to a charge of lying to federal investigators as part of U.S. Special Counsel Robert Mueller's probe into Russia's alleged interference in the 2016 U.S. presidential election. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
